root.name: Virtua Racing Deluxe
root.description: OverviewAs one of the first polygonal racing games, Virtua Racing Deluxe was a showcase of the 32X's potential. Building on the arcade original, this title adds two additional car choices and two new tracks. The new "Stock" and "Prototype" cars offer slight handling variants on the standard "Formula". The exclusive tracks "Highland" and "Sand Park" build on the arcade version's three with the latter even offering an alternative path.
